io.odysz.transact.sql

Class Statement<T extends Statement<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.transact.sql.parts.AbsPart
      • io.odysz.transact.sql.Statement<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - insert/update/delete/...
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Delete, Insert, Query, Update

    public abstract class Statement<T extends Statement<T>>
extends AbsPart
    Statement like insert, update - the structured API.
    Design Notes:
    Statement don't know semantic context. Only when committing, it's needed.
    Author:
    odys-z@github.com

      • where_

        public T where_(String op,
                String lcol,
                String rconst)
        This is a wraper of where(String, String, String) for convenient - the third arg is taken as a string constant and added single quotes at begin and end.
        Parameters:
        op -
        lcol - left column
        rconst - right constant will be adding single quotes "''"
        Returns:
        this

      • where

        public T where(Logic.op op,
               String loperand,
               String roperand)
        This is a wraper of where(String, String, String) for convenient - the third arg is taken as a string constant and added single quotes at begin and end.
        Parameters:
        op -
        loperand - left column
        roperand - right constant will NOT be adding single quotes "''"
        Returns:
        this

      • post

        public T post(Statement<?> postatement)

        Add post semantics after the parent statement, like add children after insert new parent.

        Side effect: the added post statement's context is changed - to referencing the same instance for resolving, etc.
        Parameters:
        postatement -
        Returns:
        the calling statement

      • commit

        public T commit(ArrayList<String> sqls,
                IUser... usrInfo)
         throws TransException
        Generate all sqls, put into list, with a semantext created from usrInfo. This method is a wrapper of commit(ISemantext, ArrayList).
        Parameters:
        sqls -
        usrInfo -
        Returns:
        the result set map[tabl, {newIds, resolved values}], ...
        Throws:
        TransException

      • doneOp

        operatn -

      • sql

        public abstract String sql(ISemantext context)
                    throws TransException
        Description copied from class: AbsPart
        Generating SQL after all elements in AST are ready. A context is a semantics context for resolving value references, etc. This method shouldn't been called. Use Statement#commit() to generate SQLs.
        Specified by:
        sql in class AbsPart
        Returns:
        sql
        Throws:
        TransException - Something invalid while composing sql.

      • getColumns

        public Map<String,Integer> getColumns()
        Get columns to be set / insert values.

        Delete an Insert should override this method.

        Returns:
        columns

      • composeVal

        public static ExprPart composeVal(Object v,
                                  TableMeta mt,
